title: wine_Weatherborne_2015_Pinot_Noir_(Sta._Rita_Hills)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 14128.
country: US.
description: This easy-to-drink appellation blend, which is 88% from John Sebastiano Vineyard and 12% from La Encantada, shows lively raspberry and pomegranate on the nose along with hibiscus flowers, rose petal, sweet sage and light pine forest aromas. It's lightweight on the palate, yet there is viscosity to the sip, where pomegranate-cranberry flavors meet with dried bergamot and Earl Grey tea. Simultaneously juicy and tart..
designation: .
points: 92.
price: 40.0.
province: California.
region_1: Sta. Rita Hills.
region_2: Central Coast.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
title: Weatherborne 2015 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills).
